dct_title_s: Tab. III. Europæ Galliam, Belgicam, ac Germaniæ, partem repræsentans
dct_alternative_sm: Tabula tertia Europae, Galliam, Belgicam, ac Germaniae, partem repraesentans
dct_description_sm: Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins, and explanatory text beneath title.
Appears in Halma's Claudii Ptolemaei Tabulae geographicae Orbis Terrarum Veteribus cogniti, re-issue of Mercator's edition, 1695.
